original_text: And when Rehoboam was come to Jerusalem, he gathered of the house of Judah and Benjamin an hundred and fourscore thousand chosen men, which were warriors, to fight against Israel, that he might bring the kingdom again to Rehoboam.
korean_text: 르호보암이 예루살렘에 이르러 유다와 베냐민 족속을 모으니 택한 용사가 십팔만 명이라 이스라엘과 싸워 나라를 회복하여 르호보암에게 돌리려 하더니

sentences.original_text: And when Rehoboam was come to Jerusalem
he gathered of the house of Judah and Benjamin
an hundred and fourscore thousand chosen men
that he might bring the kingdom again
